name: Slow Cooker Cheesy Hash Brown Potatoes
author: KHardy
summary: This a quick and easy slow cooker recipe, great for potlucks and game day parties. I use a slow cooker liner for easy clean up. Be creative and use different types of cheese or even hash browns for a kick.
ingredients: 1 (30 ounce) package frozen shredded hash brown potatoes
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of chicken soup
directions: Place frozen hash browns in a slow cooker
Pour melted butter over hash browns
Pour in cream of chicken soup and sour cream, stirring between each addition
Cook on Low for 4 to 5 hours
Stir mixture after 2 hours of cooking
